dataList.name: Snake Slough
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 2 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 4) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 4 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 3) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 4 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 2) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: False Halo
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (2 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: False Halo+
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (3 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: False Halo++
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 2 [Zazen]. (3 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome+
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] and 1 [DefenseUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome++
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] and 1 [AttackUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] and 1 [DefenseUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Bridle
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 2)% max HP (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle+
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 3)% max HP (max 30%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle++
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 5)% max HP (max 50%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 3; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 5; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1 and #6 Deployed Identities]

Combat Start: deal +10% more damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 30%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 10; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers
dataList.desc: When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers+
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

If the affect unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 30% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers++
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

If the affect unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 40% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug
dataList.desc: When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug+
dataList.desc:
When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

At 5+ Envy A-Reson., at Combat Start: inflict 1 [Paralysis] against all enemies.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Combat Start: when hit, inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn

dataList.name: Vestiges of the King
dataList.desc: Chain Battles) Starting from #7 Deployed Sinner, at the start of the same turn it Substitutes in, heal 10 SP, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp], and gain 1 E.G.O resource for each one of their Skills 1, 2, and 3

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP, gain Clash Power Up, and E.G.O resources when substituting in

dataList.name: Snuffed Lantern
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #7 Deployed Identity]

Gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill or Coin effects

- If the target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain more [Vibration] Count with Skill or Coin effects

dataList.name: Snuffed Candlestick
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1 Deployed Identity]

If there are enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states at Turn Start, inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] against all enemies. (3 times per turn)

On Hit against enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states: inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Shadow Monster
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #2, #7, and #8 Deployed Identities]

Gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill & Coin effects
  - If the target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead

If there are enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states at Turn Start, inflict 2 [AttackDown] or 2 [DefenseDown] against all enemies. (3 times per turn)

On Hit against enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states: inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per turn between all Identities)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain more [Vibration] Count with Skill or Coin effects

dataList.name: Packaging Box
dataList.desc:
On Hit from ally Skills) randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking], then inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect (3 times per turn)

On Kill from allies) randomly select one of the following effects: [Breath] Count, [Charge] Count, [Agility], [AttackUp], and [DefenseUp], then inflict 1 of the selected effect to a random ally (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Packaging Ribbon
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: randomly select 1 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy DMG Up' effects and apply 1 Stack to all allies

Turn Start: randomly select 1 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy Fragility' effects and inflict 1 Stack to all enemies

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain a random Affinity DMG Up effect

dataList.name: Gift
dataList.desc:
When an ally hits with a Skill, randomly select 2 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking], then inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect (3 times per turn)

When an ally hits with a Skill, randomly select one of the following effects: [Breath] Count, [Charge] Count, [Agility], [AttackUp], and [DefenseUp], then inflict 1 of the selected effect to 2 random allies (3 times per turn)

Turn Start: randomly select 2 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy DMG Up' effects and apply 1 Stack to all allies

Turn Start: randomly select 2 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy Fragility' effects and inflict 1 Stack to all enemies

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain a random Affinity DMG Up effect

dataList.name: Jolly Plushie
dataList.desc:
Gain 2 [Breath] Potency next turn based on the number of allied Attack Skills that dealt damage by Turn End
- In Focused Encounters, gain 4 [Breath] Potency instead.

Turn Start: apply 2 [Breath], +2 [Breath] Count, and 2 [Protection] on the ally with the least HP.

Deal +(absolute value of SP)% more damage. (min 0%)

When an ally with Plus Coin Skills recovers from Stagger, fully heal SP. (does not activate when Corroded)

For an ally with all Minus Coin Skills: gain 5 [Paralysis] at Turn Start.

dataList.name: Implicit Contract Renewal
dataList.desc: If there are no surviving [RequestedTarget], inflict the [RequestedTarget] effect against the first enemy to be attacked by an ally. (once per turn)

dataList.name: Darkflame Smoking Pipe
dataList.desc:
[Effect applies only to #1 Deployed Identity]

Gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] every turn

If the main target currently has a reduced Defense Level, gain 5 [Breath] before attack

Pride Pierce Skills deal +(50 / # of Coins)% more damage (including E.G.O)

dataList.name: Equalizer
dataList.desc: If the target has 1.5 or lower Pierce Resistance, Pierce Resistance +0.3

dataList.name: Swift Command
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if any allies Retreated this turn, 1 ally with the fastest Speed gains 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [AttackDmgUp] at the next Turn Start

Combat Start: if any allies were Substituted in this turn, allies that were Substituted in gain 2 [Enhancement] and 2 [Endurance]

dataList.name: Gear Shrapnel
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit has [Breath], gain 2 [DefenseUp] and 1 [Endurance]

If this unit has [Breath], the first Coin to hit deals +10% more damage

If the said Coin hits critically, +20% Damage on Critical Hit

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage with the first Coin that hits

dataList.name: CQC Manual
dataList.desc:
If a Skill that can spend [Bullet] does not spend [Bullet], gain 1 [Enhancement] this turn and next turn (once per turn)

When gaining [Bullet], Skill 3 deals +50% more damage this turn and next turn when used

When using a Skill that spends [Bullet], gain 3 [Breath] and +1 [Breath] Count
